::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod turns to Depth Charge.
"You want him, you got him. But dont call me kid! I was fighting
Decepticons, 400 years ago." 
Suddenly his comlink activates, and Mega Prime's message comes over.
"You heard that Maximals, what do we do?"
